Her lips were now centimeters away from Izuku's miniature face. He couldn't help but lose himself in their large, supple shape and the pearly-whiteness of her teeth.

"Did you hear about what happened to Uraraka-chan during her internship?"

"What? No. Do tell, Ashido-chan!"

"Well, Hagakure-chan, from what I hear- "

The pink student's chit-chat was immediately silence by the sound of the classroom door sliding open, and a deafening silence fell on the class, punctuated by a heavy, dull thud made from the sound of the entering girl's footsteps. Ochaco Uraraka blushed and hid her face as the entire class stared dumbfounded at her figure. Just a week ago, Ochaco had been a slightly chubby, but reasonably fit young woman, but as she attempted to slide into her desk chair, the change could not have been more obvious.

The brown-haired hero-in-training seemed to have put on at least 150 pound since anyone else in the class had seen her. Her once flat, if soft, tummy was now a full grown pot-belly that rested on her lap as she sat, round E-cup breasts sitting on top. Her butt was currently preventing her from being able to squeeze into her chair, too big to fit between it and the desk. Her thighs strained the limits of the sweatpants she was wearing under her school skirt, several sized up from what she wore before, and forced her into a waddling gait when she walked. The girl was 280 pounds, give or take, and not one person in the class could believe it.

"Um... I know I look really different..." The beet-red Ochaco stuttered out "but... er..."

A scrawny student with green, mussy hair stepped to stand next to her. "Don't worry Uraraka, Mr. Aizawa told us what happened. I'm really proud that you managed to take that fat-quirk villain out all by yourself! None of us think any less of you for the extra weight."

"Deku..." Uraraka was almost in tears from her friend/crush's immediate reassurance. It was nice to be loved. So nice, in fact, that she failed to notice Kaminari and Mineta's snide remarks about her weight, and Iida's quick reprimand.

Uraraka shifted weight from one foot to the other and back, swaying her big belly like a pendulum. "I mean, I appreciate the gesture, I really do, but do we really think he can help me lose this weight?"

"Of... of course, Ochaco-chan!" Yaomomo fibbed. In reality, the girls highly doubted that any kind of "miracle of modern medicine" could really get Uraraka down anywhere near her original weight, but it was worth a shot. It had been Jirou's idea to tell Ochaco that their purpose was to slim the gravity hero-in-training down, since if they could accomplish that then there would be no need to continue with this weight-gaining stunt. Failing that, however, they had their fingers crossed that this doctor could at least help the other five gain close to Uraraka's girth. Sure, they might have to lose the weight the old fashioned way, but at least they could do so together. At least, that was Asui's reasoning.

"Come on, Ochaco-chan! You've got everything to lose from this!" Mina cheered, leaving the other girls confused as to whether she was trying to make a joke or had genuinely just screwed up the idiom. "Just try it, for your own sake at least!" for my precious flat tummy's sake, too. Ashido thought to herself, terrified of having to gain a single pound more.

It took several more minutes of pleading, dragging, and turning the large girl sideways to fit her through the front door, but eventually the six class 1-A girls were in the clinic's lobby, and checked in for their appointment. Almost immediately upon doing so, the door to the doctor's office opened, and two people emerged. The first was an older man, maybe in his fifties, with short, graying hair and a slightly wrinkled, but ruggedly handsome face. He wore a lab coat and spectacles. Following him was a familiar face to the six students, someone they all knew but had never personally met. She was unmistakable with her purple and white spandex outfit and long blonde hair. The super heroine Mt. Lady exited the room, and walked into the lobby.

"Thank you so much, Doctor! I don't know how I would keep this hourglass figure without you!" The young rookie heroine proclaimed, thrusting her generous chest forward and her ample ass backwards to emphasize her point.

"No need, to thank me, Mt. Lady. You're the real hero. I'm just doing my job." The voice that came from the man was almost more handsome than the man himself. "Just stay safe and keep saving people, that's all the thanks I need."

"Oh, don't be so humble, Dr. Tougeika! I know you have a hero's license! They say you were quite the hero back in your prime, and using your quirk to help young ladies like me stay fit is heroic if I've ever seen it!"

Mt. Lady walked out the door, past the six UA students who were dumbfounded from the massive exposition dump they had just overheard. A quirk? Maybe Uraraka losing all her excess weight wasn't quite so impossible after all.

"Now, who do we have next? Uraraka-san?" The doctor looked up from his clipboard at the girls, who were the only ones present in the lobby.

-----------------

"Ah, a weight gain quirk. Interesting..." Tougeika rubbed his chiseled chin, digesting the story that the round girl and her friends had just told him. "My quirk also has to do with fat cells, you see. But there are limits to it. I don't know that there's much I can do you help with losing that much weight."

"Please, there must be something, Tougeika-san!" Uraraka put her chubby hands together to plead "I've come all this way!"

"Yes, please!" Ashido got on her knees and put her skinnier hands together, desparate for a solution.

11332121111.content:
"I'm sorry, Uraraka-san. My quirk would allow me to cause your fat to burn into energy, but doing it with so much fat all at once would be... risky, to say the least." The good doctor said in an apologetic tone. "Most people come to me for slight weight loss, or to sculpt their fat into a more appealing form. In all honesty, my quirk is better suited to converting energy into fat, for aiding the malnourished, or subduing villains back in my hero days" On the word "hero" Tougeika turned to the window of his office, and stared wistfully out to the horizon for a few seconds.

"I- I see..." Uraraka looked heartbroken. Though she had been hesitant to come here, seeing such a good man so genuinely melancholy about his inability to aid her crushed any hope she had of being anywhere near thin again. She grabbed her large belly by the love handles, and gave it a good shake, seeing it wobble, and accepting the idea that she would have to get used to being a fat girl. "Thank you, Tougeika-san. Thank you, Tsu-chan, and all of you for bringing me here..."

Ochaco waddled out of the office, looking down at where her feet might have been if her belly and boobs weren't in the way. As the door closed behind her, Dr. Tougeika turned to the other five. "You aren't going to follow her? Did you have more questions, then?"

"Just... just one." Yaoyorozu said "We've been trying to gain weight, all of us, to help Uraraka feel better about her new size. Since you can't help her slim down, could you at least help us bulk up?"

Mina gulped. She had been afraid it would come to this. She mentally said goodbye to her model's figure and all the attention she got from boys. Similar thoughts ran through all five girl's heads, to varying degrees, yet their resolve didn't waver. None of them were so scared of the idea of fatness to abandon Uraraka in her time of need. They had decided, here and now, that they would be walking out of this building just as big as their friend.

The doctor's reaction was difficult to pin down. His expression was simultaneously quizzical, happy, concerned, and determined. "You would all do that for your friend? I can see how hard of a decision that must be for you. Ethically, using my quirk to compromise your bodies like that would be questionable, but I suppose not technically illegal. As long as you're willing to fill out the paperwork..."

--------

Uraraka sat alone on a bench outside a fast food restaurant down the street from the clinic. After walking out, she had come here for some comfort food. It didn't matter what she ate, she reasoned, she would always be a fat, fat, fatty whose butt took up half the bench. She barely looked up when she heard her friends voices calling out for her from down the road. It wasn't until her friends were up by the bench that she actually faced them properly, and saw...

Uraraka blinked, half from teary eyes, half from noticing subtle changes in her friends' physiques. How could she not have seen before the extra pounds on her classmates? Yaomomo's pudgy belly, Ashido's cherubic face, Tsuyu's thick thighs, Kyoka's wide hips, and Hagakure's tight blouse? They were only a few pounds heavier than they had been originally, but it was still enough to be noticeable. Had her friends been gaining weight to make her feel better? Ochaco's eyes became even tearier at the thought. She was touched by the idea, but it made her feel even worse to know that it wasn't just her own figure that was ruined.

"Ochaco-chan, please don't cry." Asui said plainly, yet sympathetically. "We spoke with Dr. Tougeika, and we all decided that we don't want you to be fat alone. The doctor used his quirk on us to help us gain weight. If you're going to be a big girl, at least we can be big together, ribbit."

Confirming Ochaco's theory made the girl's teary eyes and light sob turn into full-on bawling. She wanted to slap her friends for being so stupid, to make her responsible for every girl in class 1-A turning into a butterball, but at the same time, wanted to hug them for being so kind. In the end, all she could think to do was shovel the rest of her fries down her gullet in a vain attempt to eat her emotions away.

A furious growling then came from the frog girl's soft stomach. She doubled over and moaned from hunger. This was how Dr. Tougeika's quirk functioned, the girl recalled. Only a few pounds were added at the time, but once the body was given energy in the form of food...

Similar rumbling came from the other girls, one after another. They practically tripped over each other as they scrambled into the restaurant to order. Uraraka added wild confusion to the exotic cocktail of emotions she was experiencing watching the others order as much food as they could collectively afford, beef bowls and burgers and takoyaki and french fries. Ashido and Hagakure practically tackled the poor bellhop when the food started to arrive, having lost almost all self control. As soon as the hot, greasy, fattening food was on the table, the five began to dig in.

The changes were almost immediate. Every bite of burger, every fry ripped into, caused soft, flabby flesh to grow on the girls. Yaoyorozu's pot belly rode her shirt up, her breasts straining to break free of her bra. Her legs were thick, but were dwarfed by Jirou's substantial backside. The punk rock girl's hips and thighs caused seams to open on her pants, though her stomach and breasts remained relatively small. Mina's weight distributed all over, a double chin appearing on her rounding face, a belly smaller than Yaomomo's but still impressive, and arms that were chubby all over. Hagakure was difficult to describe, in no small part due to her invisibility. The more her blouse rode up and the tighter her shorts became, the less of her growing body was visible, though she was clearly keeping pace with the others. As for Tsuyu, she seemed the most into the food. Her expanding hourglass figure did little to distract her from stuffing her face. Her belly remained small in favor of larger boobs and widening hips, though her face also became laden with round cheeks and a double chin.

Once the five had finally finished their meal...

Hagakure's idea, as it turned out, was to help Uraraka regain her figure. The three pooled their resources, and talked Uraraka into it, not that she needed much convincing in the first place. They kept Ochaco on a strict diet, three meals a day and no snacks, with plenty of fruits and vegetable and as few sweets and the large girl could survive without. Ashido and Asui would take turns renting out the school's workout equipment, getting Uraraka to exercise, much to her chagrin.

"Huff... Puff... am I... fit again...?" Ochaco wheezed, sweat dripping from her fat face. After almost a month of strict diet and exercise, the round girl's big figure had shrunk by about 20 pounds worth. She was still nowhere near her goal, but progress was being made. She was jogging on a treadmill, wearing sweatpants and a sweatshirt that were still small on her, but less tight than they had been. The last month had seen them almost suffocating the poor girl to now being almost loose enough to touch and cover the gap that exposed her belly.

"Not yet, Ochaco-chan" Asui croaked "But you're getting there. You've done really well, I'm proud of you."

"Thanks... huff... Tsu-chan... wheeze... you've been... gasp... so supportive...."

The froggish girl checked the time. "Okay, that's thirty minutes on the treadmill. Let's take a break and meet Ashido and Hagakure for lunch."

The pair walked/waddled to a nearby restaurant, a little ramen place, for their lunch date with their friends. Ochaco's stomach growled furiously. It did that a lot nowadays. Uraraka found that she was constantly hungry, and without the constant vigilance of her friends, would have strayed from her diet before even starting it.

"You're late!" Ashido jumped up to greet the duo as they approached the table she and Hagakure sat at. "We were worried!"

"Sorry... oof.. I'm not exactly spry..." Ochaco was drenched in sweat from both her recent workout and the walk over. "But enough about that, lets eat!"

The four were approached by their server, a massive woman who must have weighed at least 400 pounds, yet not a single ounce of it was misplaced. Her enormous hips and thunder thighs curved elegantly to a soft middle and topped off with gargantuan, but perky breasts. Raven black hair flowed down her back to her generous behind. "Hello, ladies. My name is Eri Nihagame, and I'll be you're waitress today. I recommend the beef bowl, it's quite... filling."

Ochaco's eyes widen in panic. She knew that massive body, that black hair, that sickeningly sweet voice. This was the villain whose quirk had caused her to bloat up in the first place! But before Uraraka could say or do anything, the waitress put a pudgy hand around Ashido's shoulder, causing the pink girl to flinch and pull away, but it was too late. Ashido let out a cry as she began to swell before the others' eyes, her flat abs becoming soft with adipose and turning into a paunch, then a potbelly, then a gut that hung over her waist and onto her legs, which also widened with squishy cellulite and forced tears to appear in the poor girl's skinny jeans. An expansion that lasted only ten seconds or so left Ashido weighing 300 pounds, gasping and almost crying.

The scene caused by Ashido's rapid growth had caused a panic, and all of the restaurant patrons had fled. Ochaco looked around, it was just the four of them and Nihagame. No chance at outside help, at least not until the police or some heroes came, and who knew how long that might take. Ashido was out of it, too in shock at her own bloated form, belly stuck under the table and butt hanging over the sides of her chair, to even try moving, although Uraraka knew from experience that she wouldn't be able to move much until she got used to that weight. Kaminari's train of thought got derailed when he bumped into a second year student a rather imposing second year student, "Watch where you're going first year" the second year angrily said.

Kaminari would usually apologize but he was in a bad mood due to flunking yet another written test and of course Mr.Aizawa had to scold him in front of the whole class because he was the only one who had to take remedial lessons which had the side effect of making him the biggest laughing stock in class and he also overheard some class 1-B students mocking him behind his back, to put it simply Kaminari was pissed and he wasn't gonna let some stuck up senior act all superior over him.

"You watch where you're going punk" he boldly stated, "Kid i'm giving you till the cunt of 3 to apologize" the second year told him not that Kaminari cared since well if the second year tried to harm him then he could just report him well Kaminari wasn't really a snitch but he could use it as a threat.

The second year counted to three while Kaminari just stood there unfazed then the second year grinned, "Times up kid" he said.

As the second year walks away laughing more students show up and Kaminari just barely dodged them, he realized he was only an inch tall and he would be in massive trouble if he didn't find help.

That's when he saw her. Jirou Kyouka a girl Kaminari was sort of friends with, she often made fun of him but the two enjoyed each others company and Kaminari always got this odd feeling whenever he was around the rock enthusiast a warm and calming feeling that always...Kaminari realized Jirou was leaving and headed towards her grabbing onto her shoes and barely being able to stay on.

Jirou Kyouka was heading to her class it was a busy day but she looked forward to teasing Kaminari again, he was always easy to talk too and Jirou always got this warm and calming feeling whenever she's around him one that feels just like.. just like... just like someone climbing up her leg?

Jirou looked down and saw a bug, she didn't really mind but was ready to throw it away when all of a sudden she saw a weird spark that looked oddly like, "Denki?" she thought to herself, swiftly she picked up the bug and headed to the woman's restroom hiding in one of the bathroom stalls. She held the bug close to her eyes and couldn't believe what she saw, it was an inch tall Kaminari Denki.

"Kaminari, how the hell did you get so small" she asked in a whispering tone. "Some guy used his quirk to shrink me after I pissed him off" he said the boy felt embarrassed being held up by Jirou like that and he knew the girl would either scold him or laugh at him or both.

"You idiot *sigh* well I guess I should take care of you" Jirou told him, it was weird seeing him this small but at the same time Jirou couldn't help but think of how cute he is at that size, "Hey Jirou can you not show me to anyone else please, not even the teachers" he asked.

"Why would I do that?" she asked, "Look I can't be seen like this, you know I already have a bad rep because I flunked my test and I don't need anymore unwarranted attention" Kaminari answered.

""sigh" Allright fine, but be quiet when we're in class" Jirou told him, "Re..Really THANK YOU Jirou I'll never forget this" Kaminari said. Jirou felt bad for the shrunken boy but she didn't want to show Denki her softer side mainly because he'd tease her over it...but,,, maybe at that size he won't?

"So uhh where do you wanna stay" Jirou asked, "Anywhere just make sure it's comfortable. Jirou's mind started racing wondering if she could get away with hiding him in her "Private Parts" but she decided against it, "Decide for yourself or flush you" Jirou teased.

"Um allright just...please...no...flushing" Kaminari said, he wasn't sure if Jirou was just teasing him and he didn't want to find out.

"Well it has enough open space and you can still hear with me inside because of your quirk also you'd be able to hear me better" Kaminari said.

Jirou was not expecting such a detailed answer so she relented and stuffed the boy on her ear, Kaminari was terrified at how far he was from the ground but felt safer knowing he had Jirou protecting him while Jirou herself felt bizarrely happy at the ordeal.

Jirou made her way to class unusually late, she grabbed her seat and hoped things work out.
